TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleCancelEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ConsoleCancelEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ConsoleCancelEventArgs sealed : EventArgs
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleCancelEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过同时按 修改键和 控制台键（Ctrl + C）或 修改键和 Break 控制台键（Ctrl + Break）来中断控制台应用程序进程。A user can interrupt a console application process by simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C), or the modifier key and the Break console key (Ctrl+Break). 因此 .NET Framework 为 事件的事件处理程序提供了一个 对象，以指定是否应取消该进程。The .NET Framework consequently provides a object to the event handler for the event to specify whether the process should be cancelled. 如果在事件处理程序中将 属性设置为 `true`，则会恢复进程;否则，将终止该进程。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the process is resumed; otherwise, the process is terminated. 默认情况下，将 `false` 属性的值，该进程将终止。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and the process terminates. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类来处理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Cancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Cancel : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示同时按下 修改键和 控制台键 (Ctrl+C) 或 Ctrl+Break 键是否会终止当前进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C) or the Ctrl+Break keys terminates the current process.

summary.span: 默认值为 ，这将终止当前进程。

span.span: The default is , which terminates the current process.

value.span: 如果当前进程在事件处理程序结束时应继续，则为 ；如果当前进程应终止，则为 。

span.span: if the current process should resume when the event handler concludes; if the current process should terminate.

value.span: 默认值为 ；当前进程将在事件处理程序返回时终止。

span.span: The default value is ; the current process terminates when the event handler returns.

value.span: 如果为 ，当前进程将继续。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用 事件的处理程序时， 属性将自动初始化为 `false`。The property is automatically initialized to `false` when the handler for the event is invoked. 当事件处理程序完成时， 属性的值将确定当前进程是恢复还是终止。The value of the property when the event handler finishes determines whether the current process resumes or terminates. 在按下 Ctrl + C 后，在设置操作中，指定 `true` 以指示当前进程应在事件处理程序结束时恢复，或 `false` 以指示当前进程应终止。In a set operation after Ctrl+C is pressed, specify `true` to indicate that the current process should resume when the event handler concludes, or `false` to indicate that the current process should terminate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来处理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]中，尝试将 属性设置为 如果用户按下 Ctrl + Break 调用了 事件，按 Ctrl + Break 引发了 异常。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], attempting to set the property to if the event was invoked by the user pressing Ctrl+Break threw an exception.

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]中，你可以将 属性设置为在用户按下 Ctrl + Break 后 ，并取消应用程序终止。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can set the property to after the user presses Ctrl+Break and cancel the termination of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SpecialKey As ConsoleSpecialKey
public: property ConsoleSpecialKey SpecialKey { ConsoleSpecialKey get(); };

summary.span: 获取中断当前进程的修改键和控制台键的组合。

span.span: Gets the combination of modifier and console keys that interrupted the current process.

value.span: 一个枚举值指定中断当前进程的组合键。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the key combination that interrupted the current process.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来处理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]
